=================
Formats Supported
=================

+--------+------+-------+---------------+------------------------------+
| Format | Read | Write | Since version |            Notes             |
+--------+------+-------+---------------+------------------------------+
| PNG    |  Y   |   Y   |      0.1      | 16 bit PNGs are read-only    |
+--------+------+-------+---------------+------------------------------+
| TIFF   |  Y   |   Y   |      0.1      |                              |
+--------+------+-------+---------------+------------------------------+
| JPEG   |  Y   |   Y   |      0.1      |                              |
+--------+------+-------+---------------+------------------------------+
| WEBP   |  Y   |   N   |      0.2      |                              |
+--------+------+-------+---------------+------------------------------+
| BMP    |  Y   |   N   |      0.2.5    | Only uncompressed bitmaps    |
|        |      |       |               | are supported.               |
+--------+------+-------+---------------+------------------------------+
| STK    |  Y   |   N   |      0.2      |                              |
+--------+------+-------+---------------+------------------------------+
| LSM    |  Y   |   N   |      0.2.2    |                              |
+--------+------+-------+---------------+------------------------------+
| XCF    |  Y   |   N   |      0.2.2    | Only if ``xcf2png`` utility  |
|        |      |       |               | is found in the path.        |
+--------+------+-------+---------------+------------------------------+
